backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all core data types (Product, Order, Cart, Review, etc.) and state maps for an e-commerce platform, mixing in storage and authorization modules. Includes counters for IDs and a hard-coded admin principal.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: ensuring product prices are stored/transmitted as USD dollars without currency conversion in ProductForm, and ensuring item totals across cart/checkout/order views use raw USD prices without conversion.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing short summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component's purpose and notable implementation details for the Mosslight Studios e-commerce app.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Mosslight Studios React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router route tree for all app pages (home, products, cart, admin sections, forum, etc.) and wraps the app with ThemeProvider, AdminAuthProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-page access denied UI component with a shield icon, descriptive message, and a button to navigate back to the home page.
Cart button component that handles quantity input, variant selection validation, inventory checks, and calls the addToCart mutation using either the variant price or base product price.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: HOC-style guard component that shows a loading skeleton while checking admin status and renders an AccessDeniedScreen if the user is not an authenticated admin.
Modal dialog component for admin authentication that accepts an 8-digit passcode, calls the login hook, and navigates to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/components/AdminNotificatio: Displays unread admin and low-inventory notifications in a card panel, with a button to mark each notification as read.
frontend/src/components/AdminReplyForm.t: Form component visible only to admin users that allows posting a reply to a specific discussion board post.
Form for authenticated users to submit a new question to the discussion board, with loading and auth-state feedback.
frontend/src/components/CustomerMessages: Renders a list of messages sent to a customer from Mosslight Studios, labeling broadcast messages with an 'Announcement' badge.
frontend/src/components/DiscussionPostLi: Displays a sorted list of discussion posts as clickable cards showing the question, status badge, timestamp, and reply count.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer showing social media links, copyright year, and a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link.
frontend/src/components/GalleryItem.tsx: Renders a single gallery card with an optional media image, content text, and records a content-view analytics event on mount.
frontend/src/components/GalleryUploadFor: Admin form for uploading gallery content with optional media files, showing upload progress and calling the addSocialMediaContent mutation on submit.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with navigation links, cart icon with item count badge, notification bell, admin login modal, and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper that renders the Header, a main content area via React Router's Outlet, and the Footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component for Internet Identity login/logout that also displays a truncated principal with a copy-to-clipboard action when authenticated.
Admin form card for composing and sending broadcast messages to all customers via the useSendMessage hook.
frontend/src/components/MessageHistory.t: Displays a list of previously sent messages as cards, showing timestamp, broadcast/direct badge, content, and optional recipient.
frontend/src/components/MyOrderCard.tsx: Card component showing a single customer order with its items, variant details, per-line totals, and overall order total pulled from backend data.
frontend/src/components/NotificationBell: Dropdown notification bell that fetches unread notifications and allows marking them as read, displaying icons based on notification type and relative timestamps.
frontend/src/components/OrderList.tsx: Admin order list with search filtering by order ID or customer, and inline status update controls for each order.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Small badge component that maps an OrderStatus value (pending/shipped/delivered) to a styled Badge variant and label.
Badge component that renders a forum post's status (open/answered) with corresponding color styles.
frontend/src/components/PrincipalDisplay: Displays the authenticated user's Internet Identity principal in a banner with a copy-to-clipboard button and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Renders a product card with image, name, star rating, description, and price (supporting variants), and records an analytics event on click.
frontend/src/components/ProductFilterSid: Sidebar component that derives available filter options (categories, price ranges, colors, sizes) from the product list and manages active filter state with toggle/clear controls.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing a product, handling fields like name, SKU, price, inventory, images, tags, and variants, with upload progress tracking and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/ProductReviews.t: Displays a list of product reviews with star ratings, verified-purchase badges, and timestamps, plus an aggregate average rating summary.
frontend/src/components/ProductSearch.ts: Provides a search input and price-range dropdown that filter a product list in real time and notify the parent via a callback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that collects a new user's name, email, and shipping address on first login and saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ReplyList.tsx: Renders a sorted list of reply cards, each displaying an admin badge and formatted timestamp alongside the reply content.
frontend/src/components/ReviewForm.tsx: A form component for authenticated users to submit a star rating and text review for a given product, with validation and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/SocialMediaLinks: Displays icon links to the Moss Light Studios Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok profiles.
frontend/src/components/VariantManager.t: A CRUD UI component for managing product variants (size, color, price, inventory), supporting add, edit, and delete operations with form validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.tsx: Provides an AdminAuthContext that handles admin authentication via a hardcoded passcode with 24-hour session persistence, and auto-detects admin status via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnalytics.ts: Exposes React Query hooks to fetch aggregated analytics data (clicks, views, revenue, orders, low inventory) and to record analytics events.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides React Query hooks for viewing the cart, adding items, clearing the cart, and checking out, with cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerMessages.t: Exposes a React Query hook to fetch the authenticated user's messages from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerOrders.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch all of the current user's orders or a single order by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useDiscussionBoard.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all discussion posts, a single thread, creating a new post, and adding a reply.
frontend/src/hooks/useGallery.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch social media content and a stub mutation for adding content (not yet implemented in the backend).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching messages and sending a message to a recipient via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching unread notifications and marking a notification as read via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching orders and updating an order's status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting products via the backend actor, with permission and auth error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductVariants.ts: Exports a React Query hook for fetching product variants for a given product ID via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReviews.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching product reviews with average rating and submitting a new review via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile and retrieving their user role via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, defines Mosslight Studios brand color tokens for light and dark modes, and imports Google Fonts (Playfair Display and Inter).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page displaying Mosslight Studios' story, mission, and contact/social media links using card components.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAnalyticsPage.ts: Admin page displaying analytics metrics including total revenue, order count, product clicks, content views, and low inventory alerts, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard landing page showing navigation cards for all admin sections (products, orders, messages, gallery, forum, analytics) along with a notifications panel.
frontend/src/pages/AdminGalleryPage.tsx: Admin page for managing the gallery, rendering the GalleryUploadForm component within an AdminGuard wrapper.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMessagesPage.tsx: Admin page for customer messaging with tabs for composing new messages and viewing message history, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrdersPage.tsx: Admin page that fetches and displays all customer orders using the OrderList component, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin page for managing the product catalog with the ability to add, edit, and delete products, toggling between a product grid and a ProductForm.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page that displays cart items with product details and totals, and allows users to clear the cart or proceed to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that shows pre-filled shipping info from the user profile and a demo payment input, placing an order on submission and redirecting to an order success page.
frontend/src/pages/FAQPage.tsx: Renders a static FAQ page organized into four categories (Shipping, Returns, Product Care, Ordering) using an accordion component for collapsible Q&A items.
frontend/src/pages/ForumPage.tsx: Displays a discussion board page with a question submission form and a list of existing posts fetched via the useDiscussionPosts hook.
frontend/src/pages/ForumThreadPage.tsx: Shows a single forum thread by postId, displaying the question, status badge, timestamp, replies list, and an admin reply form.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a gallery page that fetches and displays social media content items in a responsive grid alongside social media follow links.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero section with background image, a three-feature highlights section, and a call-to-action section linking to products and gallery.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Authenticated account page showing the user's orders and messages in tabs, with a profile setup modal for new users and an access denied screen for unauthenticated visitors.
frontend/src/pages/OrderSuccessPage.tsx: Confirmation page shown after a successful order, displaying the order ID and buttons to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product detail page that fetches a product and its variants, handles size/color selection, displays dynamic pricing, stock status, add-to-cart, and product reviews.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Renders the main products listing page with text search and sidebar filters (category, price range, color, size) applied in combination. Fetches products via a custom hook and displays them in a grid using ProductCard components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routing, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash without a page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based design tokens, emerald/nude brand colors, Playfair Display/Inter fonts, elegant box shadows, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state for Mosslight Studios e-commerce app, documenting a known currency-conversion bug (prices incorrectly converted from USD to cents/GBP) and listing existing fix features plus a pending backend audit task.
